data_topic.label: Data Topic
data_topic.help: (Optional) The topic type to listen to for sensor data. Default: data

message_topic.label: Message Topic
message_topic.help: (Optional) The topic type to listen to for messages. Default: messages

groupmessage_topic.label: Group Message Topic
groupmessage_topic.help: (Optional) The topic type to listen to for group messages. Default: groupmessages
